thread.title: BRIEF-Longi Silicon Materials signs agreement on agricultural photovoltaic project in Hebei
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Longi Silicon Materials signs agreement on agricultural photovoltaic project in Hebei | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Longi Silicon Materials signs agreement on agricultural photovoltaic project in Hebei
text:
Sept 28 Xian Longi Silicon Materials Corp
* Says signs strategic agreement on agricultural photovoltaic project in Hebei province, total investment about 800 million yuan ($125.60 million)
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1JxVYSl
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3694 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting By Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
